document.full_text: carmelo anthony helped lift the knicks out of their recent slump with 39 points and 10 rebounds in new york's 113-106 overtime win over the orlando magic on monday.
document.title: nba's knicks end slump with ot win over magic
lines_and_colors: carmelo anthony helped lift the knicks out of their recent slump with 39 points and 10 rebounds in new york's 113-106 overtime win over the orlando magic on monday.
